title: Strategic Piling
mainText: Next Rocks ({r:rocks=x}) card you play instead adds Shinies ({r:shinies=x}).{n}{kw:On Bid} â€” One Rocks ({r:rocks=x}) card in your bidding pool is considered as Shinies ({r:shinies=x}).
flavourText: By dumping the rocks underneath a thin layer of gold nuggets we are able to save a lot of money! Nobody is checking those mine carts anyway! - Loki, the Scoundrel.
